title: woRldnews::News Headlines using R
text: section, want introduce interactive user interface user can use run application. run shiny app create window user’s preferred browser ask user select parameters news search. Based parameters, application search news headlines display tabular format. data table, user can see news title, news description, published date, news url image associated news. click news link, directly take user original website news published.

title: Authors and Citation
Authors and Citation

title: Finds The Top News Headlines of the World
text: woRldnews can installed devtools get recent production version GitHub:
code: #install.packages('devtools') # if devtools is not already installed #devtools::install_github('eshitazaman/stat585-project')

title: Finds The Top News Headlines of the World
text: Welcome woRldnews! can search news articles R, ’ll need create free account [Newsapi.org] (https://newsapi.org) acquire apikey using news_api function. Newsapi assign apikey. can save apikey .Rprofile future use “newsapi_save_apikey” function.

title: Finds The Top News Headlines of the World
text: relevant searches, woRldnews features two “shiny” apps. search news, use runshiny function: run function, ’ll receive shiny widget : Search box First enter apikey provided newsapi.org. , select boxes shiny.app, select country category news search. receive search results table format 20 top headlines including title, description, date, url, url image. clicking url can access related websites. Search results search articles, use runshiny function: run function, ’ll receive shiny widget : Search box First enter apikey provided newsapi.org. ,select boxes shiny.app, enter keyword, select language sort articles search. can narrow search specific dates within previous 30 days. `` receive search results table format 20 top headlines including title, description, content, url, author publication date. Search results

title: Finds The Top News Headlines of the World
Finds The Top News Headlines of the World
text: Newsapi.org basic, easy--use REST API offers JSON search results current historical news stories 80,000 sources throughout world.
